title: Ep. - 471- THE STAIRCASE THE ULTIMATUM
description:
Diane Fanning, author of Written in Blood helps Kate discuss the documentary series The Staircase on Netflix. In 2001 novelist Michael Peterson's wife died, and he claimed she perished after falling down stairs at their home. The medical examiner, however, determined that she had been beaten with a weapon, which led to Peterson becoming a suspect in what would become a murder investigation. This series, which began with eight episodes in 2005 before being updated in 2013 and 2018, follows the investigation as it proceeds from Peterson's arrest to a verdict being reached in the ensuing trial. The real-life courtroom thriller offers a rare and revealing inside look at a high-profile murder trial and an examination of contemporary American justice.

 

Pat and Nick from Another Below Deck podcast help Kate review The Ultimatum on Netflix, which follows six longtime couples who are at an impasse because one person wants to get married and the other does not. The show tests each relationship by having them split up, couple up with another cast member, and see if the ultimatum has made them change their mind.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca

Tik Tok: http://www.tiktok.com/itskatecasey

Clubhouse: @katecasey 

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey
